title: Hands-On Precision Agriculture Data Management Workshops for Producers and Industry Professionals: Development and Assessment

openAccessPdf.disclaimer: Notice: Paper or abstract available at https://api.unpaywall.org/v2/10.34068/joe.53.04.04?email=<INSERT_YOUR_EMAIL> or https://doi.org/10.34068/joe.53.04.04, which is subject to the license by the author or copyright owner provided with this content. abstract: Three Precision Agriculture Data Management workshops regarding yield monitor data were conducted in 2014, reaching 62 participants. Post-workshop surveys (n=58) indicated 73% of respondents experienced a moderate to significant increase in knowledge related to yield monitor data usage. Another 72% reported that they planned to utilize best management practices presented or would expand their current practices based on knowledge gained. One-year post-workshop survey (n=14) results indicated that far less (36%) were able to implement some of the techniques presented. However, comments indicated that accessible follow-up material would be beneficial in successfully integrating learning topics into data management systems.
